content: this is a rectangular shawl knit from end to end the size is adjustable by modifying the number of repeats details are in the pattern i used a handspun yarn but i think you could use any laceweight or light fingering weight yarn adjusting the needle size to give you a hand you like i used addi us 1 needles but i tend to knit very loosely warning - the pattern has not been test knitted by anyone other than myself so there may be errors please let me know if you find any and i will post a corrected version thanks 8-4-2020 new version wrong sides should be purled not knitted between seed stitch borders 8-9-2020 new version hopefully this time i fixed all the places where knit should be purl on the wrong side row my apologies
